about_the_game:
Underground Prisoner is a necromancer's journey through a world of dangerous adventures in search of a precious soul herb that can summon and control the souls of the dead. Explore dark forests, abandoned cemeteries and dungeons, fight terrible monsters and solve riddles to achieve your goal.

This game offers an exciting 2D platformer-style adventure with puzzle elements. The hero will have to destroy dangerous enemies, collect important items and overcome various obstacles.

Beware of your competitors - other necromancers who are hungry for power and are ready to do anything for the herb of the soul. Will you be able to overcome all obstacles, take possession of the precious ingredient and become the most powerful necromancer in the world?
